title: #491 Scammersutra with Mike Feeney
itunes:title: Scammersutra with Mike Feeney
description:
Mike Feeney came to talk to me about scams! how to play it off and which are his favorites and his mom, the ultimate scam artist! 

 

For more Ari:

Get tickets to see Ari on the road: https://www.arishaffir.com/tour

Cool merch & more: https://www.arishaffir.com/

 

For more Mike: https://www.mikefeeneycomedy.com/ 

Check out his special Rage Against The Routine: https://youtu.be/YG2MgJiTu3o 

 

The Music:

Goog Dolls- Sweetest Lie

Steve Miller Band- Take The Money and Run

Paul McCartney- Band on the Run

Jamiroquai- Scam

 

Thank you 3chi.com for sponsoring this episode! Use code "Ari" for 5% off on 3Chi.com.
